title: Brigitte Lamy
text:
Brigitte Lamy (born 28 December 1950 in <a href="%C3%89pinal">Épinal</a>) is a French <a href="curling">curler</a>.
She participated in the <a href="demonstration%20sport">demonstration</a> curling event at the <a href="Curling%20at%20the%201992%20Winter%20Olympics">1992 Winter Olympics</a>, where the French women's team finished in seventh place.
At the national level, she is a <a href="French%20Women%27s%20Curling%20Championship">French women's champion</a> curler (1989).
